title: Elementary Online Conversation-Centered Integrated Language Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Literacy Skills and Daily Conversational Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: Hybrid model combining three weekly live video sessions with asynchronous mobile activities. Utilization of smartphone app-based learning resources

learning_goals: Learners can conduct synchronous conversations on everyday topics with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can communicate flexibly by applying language rules in real-time feedback environments
Learners voluntarily participate in language practice activities at least twice weekly via mobile platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
